cmake: if not exist "CMakeLists.txt" ( echo has any CMakeLists.txt? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if ""%profilename%"" == """" ( echo please input a project name. & exit /b 0 )
open.dir: if not exist ""%1"" ( echo has no this dir. & exit /b 0)
qt.creator: cd ${root.build}
start ${qt}/Tools/QtCreator/bin/qtcreator.exe
open.build: rem if not exist "*.pro" ( echo has any .pro? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
add.project: if ""%src_path%"" == ""%PYMAKEDEFAULTWORKROOT%"" ( echo please don't create project in default exec root, please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
add.project.2: if ""%src_path%"" == ""%PYMAKEDEFAULTWORKROOT%"" ( echo please don't create project in default exec root, please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
add.project.lib: if ""%src_path%"" == ""%PYMAKEDEFAULTWORKROOT%"" ( echo please don't create project in default exec root, please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
add.project.lib.2: if ""%src_path%"" == ""%PYMAKEDEFAULTWORKROOT%"" ( echo please don't create project in default exec root, please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
add.sdk: if not exist "*.pro" ( echo has any .pro? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if not exist "%src%" ( echo %profilename%.pro is not exist. & exit /b 0)
if not exist "%sdktool%" ( echo %sdktool% is not exist. please build it in debug mode. & exit /b 0)
add.sdk.2: if not exist "*.pro" ( echo has any .pro? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if not exist "%src%" ( echo %profilename%.pro is not exist. & exit /b 0)
if not exist "%sdktool%" ( echo %sdktool% is not exist. please build it in debug mode. & exit /b 0)
build.qmake: if not exist "*.pro" ( echo has any .pro? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if not exist "%src%" ( echo %profilename%.pro is not exist. & exit /b 0)
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
open.run.d: rem if not exist "*.pro" ( echo has any .pro? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
if not exist "%exe%" ( echo %profilename%d.exe is not exist. & exit /b 0)
open.run: rem if not exist "*.pro" ( echo has any .pro? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
if not exist "%exe%" ( echo %profilename%.exe is not exist. & exit /b 0)
build.cmake: if not exist "CMakeLists.txt" ( echo has any CMakeLists.txt? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if ""%profilename%"" == """" ( echo please input a project name. & exit /b 0 )
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
build.cmake.1: if not exist "CMakeLists.txt" ( echo has any CMakeLists.txt? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if ""%profilename%"" == """" ( echo please input a project name. & exit /b 0 )
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
if not %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( echo cmake exit code: %ERRORLEVEL% & exit /b %ERRORLEVEL% )
build.cmake.2: if not exist "CMakeLists.txt" ( echo has any CMakeLists.txt? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if ""%profilename%"" == """" ( echo please input a project name. & exit /b 0 )
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
if not %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( echo cmake exit code: %ERRORLEVEL% & exit /b %ERRORLEVEL% )
qqt.daily: rem del /f /q /s demo examples src test
rem del /f /q /s demo examples src test
qqt.build: rem del /f /q /s demo examples src test
build.go: if not exist "*.go" ( echo has any .go? please add here command to restrict. & exit /b 0 )
if not exist "%src%" ( echo %profilename%.go is not exist. & exit /b 0)
rem del /f /q demo examples src test
